description: This file contains a function `run_pytests_with_allure` which executes pytest tests with Allure reporting, manages results directories, and optionally generates an Allure static report. It includes setup, cleanup, and execution of subprocess calls for testing and report generation.

methods.name: Tuple[int,str,str] run_pytests_with_allure(tests_dir: str, allure_results_dir: str, allure_report_dir: str, timeout: int = 600, extra_args: str = "")
methods.description: Executes pytest with specified parameters, cleans previous results, and generates an Allure report if possible. Returns the subprocess return code, stdout, and stderr.

ctags.name: run_pytests_with_allure
ctags.pattern: /^def run_pytests_with_allure(tests_dir: str, allure_results_dir: str, allure_report_dir: str, tim/
ctags.signature: (tests_dir: str, allure_results_dir: str, allure_report_dir: str, timeout: int = 600, extra_args: str = "")
